Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, React, NodeJS and ExpressJS and sometimes works with databases like MySQL and MongoDB applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked on Front End Technologies,like Angular with different versions, and covering front end developer roles with HTML, (S)CSS, Javascript, JQuery. I have knowledge of backend technologies like, Node Js and Express JS, and Databases like MySQL and MongoDB.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: MEAN Stack developer
Description: Created Angular-based responsive web application from scratch where admin and user have login and sign-up credentials
Admin can manage the property listed and the user can buy these properties with the facilities listed by the admin, and Admin can go through the complaints registered by the user
Worked on performance improvement and speed optimization and boosted network, and system availability through preventive maintenance & upgrades
Worked with back-end developers to integrate with APIs to manipulate asynchronous data and used GitHub to maintain the versions of code

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer
Description: Developed NoCode responsive web application which is an Angular based project that is created to reduce the workload of creating applications with or without buying domains through programming
Designed reusable and reliable code for use within a distributed cloud environments and to maintain the versions of code on GitLab.
Organized this project in such a way that you can create your own style application according to your needs to create n number of applications
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: The Product is designed using Angular to give the decision of Pay or No Pay whether the transaction can be done or not depending on the Limits and Balances of particular risk entity
Revised, debugged, and updated old code bases to modern development standards, reducing operating costs, and improving functionality

Improving Application performance and creating a tree structure that shows the hierarchy of Customer Group, Customer, Account Group, and Account, which represents the limits and balances of child and parents
Design layout with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Prime Faces, etc.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects I worked
FeatureProjects.Label: My Projects

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MERN Stack Login and CRUD Application
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: React Js and Node Js based web responsive application with features like Login and Registration of users and each user has created record on which he can perform Create, Read, Update and Delete operations

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Studunt Record Keeping
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This is the Angular and Node JS based responsive web application, where user can have list of Students where admin can create new record of student with profile photo and also can update the records accoording to the needs and also delete the records.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Snippet Visualization System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: We introduced Snippet visualization technique to visualize the collection of textual resul returned from web a query. The method builds meaningful layouts that optimize the placement of snippets that considers both overlapping removal and preservation of neighborhood structures. Since snippet visualization system relays only on information extracted from web result, it can be plugged into search engines in a straightforward manner.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: B.Tech (Information Technology)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: DKTE Textile and Engineering Institute, Ichalakaranji

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
